title: Agent Response Message
description: A response message from a Desktop Agent to the Bridge.

type.title: Response Message Type
type.description: Identifies the type of the message and it is typically set to the FDC3 function name that the message relates to, e.g. 'findIntent', with 'Response' appended.

payload.title: Response Message Payload
payload.description: The message payload typically contains return values for FDC3 API functions.

AgentResponseMeta.title: Agent Response Metadata
AgentResponseMeta.description: Metadata for a response messages sent by a Desktop Agent to the Bridge

requestUuid.description: UUID for the request this message is responding to.

responseUuid.description: UUID for this specific response message.

timestamp.description: Timestamp at which the response was generated

source.title: Response Source identifier
source.description: Field that represents the source application instance that the response was produced by, or the Desktop Agent if it produced the response without an application.
